name: UI: Verify 'Use secret text(s) or file(s)' checkbox is selected

testStage.description: Ensure 'Use secret text(s) or file(s)' checkbox is selected on Configure page of a multi-configuration project

steps.name: Go to the Multiconfig project page by clicking project link.
Go to Configure page
Go to Configure page of project "MyProject"
Assert 'Use secret text(s) or file(s)' checkbox is selected'
